#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector> 
#include <string>
#include <queue>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {

	// choose row with smallest number (?)
	int n,m;
	cin >> n;
	cin >> m; 

	vector< vector<int> > store; 

	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		vector<int> c; 
		for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
			int curr;
			cin >> curr; 
			c.push_back(curr); 
		}
		store.push_back(c); 
	}	

	int mins[n] = {0};
	// stores the mins of each row
	
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		//Find min
		int min = 1000000001;
		int curr = 0; 
		for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
			curr = store[i][j];
			if (curr < min) {
				min = curr;
			}
		}		
		mins[i] = min;
	} 

	//find max 
	int max = 0;
	int curr = 0;
	//int index = -1; 
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		curr = mins[i];
		if (curr > max) {
			max = curr;
			//index = i; 
		}
	}

	cout << max << "\n";
	
	return 0;
}
